passive_2: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 5 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 5 bonus mana, increased to 10 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.

passive_1: Grants ability power equal to 1% of your max mana.
Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% of your max mana.

motd: Bugfix: No longer unintentionally mutually exclusive with Lifeline items such as Sterak's Gage or Immortal Shieldbow.
Bugfix: Abilities which empower a champion's basic attack will now properly trigger Mana Charge when hitting epic monsters.

passive_2: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
motd: Bugfix: Mana charge no longer triggers off abilities used on Gangplank's Powder Keg.

passive_1: Grants ability power equal to 3% of your max mana.
passive_2: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 450 bonus mana.

motd: Change: When gaining maximum mana from Mana Charge, now preserves current mana percent instead of restoring the same amount of maximum mana gained.

passive_1: Grants ability power equal to 1% of your max mana. Refunds 25% of mana spent.

passive_2: Each time you spend mana, your maximum mana increases by 6 (occurs up to 3 times every 12 seconds). Bonus caps at +750 mana.
Each time you spend mana, your maximum mana increases by 6 (occurs up to 3 times every 12 seconds). Bonus caps at +750 mana.

passive_1: Grants ability power equal to 3% of your max mana. Refunds 25% of mana spent.

passive_2: Each time you use an ability or spend mana, your maximum mana increases by 6 (occurs up to 2 times every 8 seconds). Bonus caps at +750 mana.
Each time you use an ability or spend mana, your maximum mana increases by 6. This effect has a 3 second cooldown. Bonus caps at +750 mana.
Each time you use an ability or spend mana, your maximum mana increases by 5. This effect has a 3 second cooldown. Bonus caps at +750 mana.
passive_4: Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at maximum bonus mana.

passive_1: Grants ability power equal to 3% of your max mana.

passive_2: Each time your Champion uses an Ability their Maximum Mana will increase by 4 Mana. This effect has a 3 second cooldown. Bonus caps at +1000 mana.
motd: Note: Patch notes claim that ability power conversion ratio was increased to 2.5% from 2%, but it's unclear when it was last reduced to 2%.

passive_2: Each time your Champion uses an Ability their Maximum Mana will increase by 4 Mana. This effect has a 3 second cooldown. Bonus caps at +600 mana.
motd: Note: It's unclear when the mana cap was introduced, so assuming it's on the same patch as when it was added for Tear.

passive_2: Each time your Champion uses an Ability their Maximum Mana will increase by 4 Mana. This effect has a 3 second cooldown.

passive_1: Grants ability power equal to 2.5% of your max mana.
Grants ability power equal to 2.5% of your current mana.
